tests.name: TraceparentSchema - W3C Compliance Valid traceparents should accept valid W3C traceparent format
TraceparentSchema - W3C Compliance Valid traceparents should generate valid traceparent via generateTraceparent()
TraceparentSchema - W3C Compliance Valid traceparents generateTraceparent() produces unique trace-ids
TraceparentSchema - W3C Compliance Invalid traceparents should reject wrong version
TraceparentSchema - W3C Compliance Invalid traceparents should reject wrong trace-id length (not 32 hex)
TraceparentSchema - W3C Compliance Invalid traceparents should reject wrong parent-id length (not 16 hex)
TraceparentSchema - W3C Compliance Invalid traceparents should reject uppercase hex (strict W3C compliance)
TraceparentSchema - W3C Compliance Invalid traceparents should reject non-hex characters
TraceparentSchema - W3C Compliance Invalid traceparents should reject empty string
TraceparentSchema - W3C Compliance Invalid traceparents should reject wrong delimiter
TraceparentSchema - W3C Compliance Invalid traceparents should reject prefix before valid traceparent (^ anchor)
TraceparentSchema - W3C Compliance Invalid traceparents should reject suffix after valid traceparent ($ anchor)
TraceparentSchema - W3C Compliance propagateTraceparent - Trace continuity should preserve trace-id across propagation
TraceparentSchema - W3C Compliance propagateTraceparent - Trace continuity should generate new parent-id for each propagation
CloudEventsBaseSchema - CloudEvents 1.0 Compliance Required fields should accept valid CloudEvents base
CloudEventsBaseSchema - CloudEvents 1.0 Compliance Required fields should reject missing specversion
CloudEventsBaseSchema - CloudEvents 1.0 Compliance Required fields should reject missing id
CloudEventsBaseSchema - CloudEvents 1.0 Compliance Required fields should reject missing source
CloudEventsBaseSchema - CloudEvents 1.0 Compliance Required fields should reject missing type
CloudEventsBaseSchema - CloudEvents 1.0 Compliance Field constraints should only accept specversion "1.0"
CloudEventsBaseSchema - CloudEvents 1.0 Compliance Field constraints should require valid UUID for id
CloudEventsBaseSchema - CloudEvents 1.0 Compliance Field constraints should accept URL or /hfo/ path for source
CloudEventsBaseSchema - CloudEvents 1.0 Compliance Field constraints should require non-empty type
CloudEventsBaseSchema - CloudEvents 1.0 Compliance Field constraints should reject source with empty /hfo/ prefix
HFOExtensionsSchema Required fields should accept valid HFO extensions
HFOExtensionsSchema Required fields should reject gen < 85
HFOExtensionsSchema Required fields should reject invalid hive phase
HFOExtensionsSchema Required fields should reject port outside 0-7
HFOExtensionsSchema Required fields should accept all valid HIVE phases
HFOExtensionsSchema Required fields should accept all valid ports 0-7
HFOExtensionsSchema Optional fields constraints should accept hfostage 1-7
HFOExtensionsSchema Optional fields constraints should reject hfostage outside 1-7
HFOExtensionsSchema Optional fields constraints should accept hfomark 0-1
HFOExtensionsSchema Optional fields constraints should reject hfomark outside 0-1
HFOExtensionsSchema Optional fields constraints should accept valid hfopull directions
VacuoleEnvelope - Full Integration wrapInVacuole should wrap data in valid CloudEvents envelope
VacuoleEnvelope - Full Integration wrapInVacuole should generate valid traceparent
VacuoleEnvelope - Full Integration VacuoleEnvelopeSchema - Direct parsing should parse valid envelope with data
VacuoleEnvelope - Full Integration VacuoleEnvelopeSchema - Direct parsing should reject envelope with wrong data type
VacuoleEnvelope - Full Integration propagateVacuole should preserve trace-id across envelope propagation
PIPELINE_EVENT_TYPES should have 7 stages
PIPELINE_EVENT_TYPES should follow hfo.w3c.gesture.stageN.{stage} naming
PIPELINE_NATS_SUBJECTS should have 7 stages
PIPELINE_NATS_SUBJECTS should follow hfo.w3c.gesture.{stage} naming
Mutation Defense - Property Tests pressure must be in [0,1] - mutant killer
Mutation Defense - Property Tests port must be in [0,7] - mutant killer
Mutation Defense - Property Tests generation must be >= 85 - mutant killer
Mutation Defense - Property Tests traceparent format strict - mutant killer
propagateVacuole - Stage Transition Mutations should correctly replace stage NUMBER with new stage number - kills \d → \D mutant
propagateVacuole - Stage Transition Mutations should produce non-empty type after propagation - kills empty string literal mutant
propagateVacuole - Stage Transition Mutations should handle all 7 stages correctly - comprehensive stage digit test
CloudEventsBaseSchema - datacontenttype validation should accept application/json for datacontenttype - kills empty literal mutant
CloudEventsBaseSchema - datacontenttype validation should reject empty string for datacontenttype - kills empty literal mutant
TraceparentSchema - Error message validation should provide meaningful error message for invalid traceparent - kills empty message mutant
wrapInVacuole - Default values validation should default hfopull to "downstream" not empty string - kills hfopull mutation
wrapInVacuole - Default values validation should respect explicit hfopull value
